name: h264-streamer
description: Combined MJPEG/H.264 camera streamer - provides MJPEG stream for Mainsail/Fluidd and H.264 FLV stream for Anycubic slicer. Uses USB camera with hardware H.264 encoding.

autolanmode.description: Automatically enable LAN mode on startup if not already enabled. Required for camera access.

auto_skip.description: Automatically adjust frame skip ratio based on CPU usage to keep at least 40% CPU free.

target_cpu.description: Target maximum CPU usage when auto-skip is enabled (30-90%).

jpeg_quality.description: JPEG quality for hardware encoding in rkmpi-yuyv mode (1-99).
